articles.title: Firestorm in Bengal over Birbhum arson that killed 8, BJP seeks President’s Rule | Top Points - India Today
articles.description: At least eight people were charred to death in an arson incident in Bengal's Birbhum on Tuesday. In the aftermath, battle lines are clearly drawn as the BJP demanded President's Rule in the state and the ruling TMC denied all involvement in the incident.
